t: Why Amazon's subtle rebrand is a triumph, according to Frontify's director of brand
s: 3 weeks ago - But in this move they've made, ... more at home. I think the other byproduct of that is they seem to have lent away from the word Amazon and much more into the assets themselves, like the smile or the typography or the name of the sub-brand, like Prime, which has a beautiful impact in that it gives the sub-brand more time to shine. ... It has more impact, but also far more cohesion as you jump from one sub-product over to another ...
